_header: Riding all alone with sorrow sore encumbered
Title(s): ‘Epitaffe of the moste noble & valyaunt Iasper late duke of Beddeforde’
Subjects: Tudor, Jasper, duke of Bedford; epitaphs
_description: ‘Epitaffe of the moste noble & valyaunt Iasper late duke of Beddeforde’, A.D. 1495 — introduction and twenty sections in many different verse forms
